Member Function Documentation

virtual bool ibase::IFileConvertCopy::ConvertFiles ( const QString &  inputPath,
const QString &  outputPath,
const iprm::IParamsSet *  paramsPtr = NULL 
) const [pure virtual]

Copy a file or files from inputPath to destination outputPath.

Optionally, you can use paramsPtr to control the copy process.

Implemented in iqt::CFileInfoCopyComp, and ibase::CFileCopyOverLoaderComp.
